message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to both of us. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. Let me know if this works for you!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product but I'm only able to offer $100 at this time. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your interest, Bob! I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to consider it, but I need to keep my options open. Would you be willing to increase your offer slightly?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  However, I'm still only able to offer $102.  If that doesn't work for you, I might have to consider other options.
Bob, I understand your position and I'm glad we're able to negotiate. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $103. This is my final offer.
